name: Grandfather's Legacy
description: This is Patrick Mann's first assignment for his Spring 2020 DIG4715C class.  It is a game created in the "Bitsy" tool called "Grandfather's Legacy," and it is made in the style of something that would be seen on the ZX Spectrum.  The player takes on the role of a person traveling to their mysterious late grandfather's manor to claim their inheritance, and coming across weird creatures in the process.
